page.title: 02SCHOOLS HISTORY
page.content: 5 PRIMARY SCHOOLS IN SOUTH WOODHAM FERRERS,1 JUNIOR, 1 INFANT IN HULLBRIDGE. ELMWOOD ORIGINAL VILLAGE SCHOOL IN S.W.F. PRIMARY SCHOOL POPULATION IN S.W.F. HAS GROWN FROM 630(1976) TO 1750(1985).HAS DECREASED IN HULLBRIDGE WITH ITS MORE ESTABLISHED COMMUNITY. 2 FURTHER PRIMARY SCHOOLS IN S.W.F. ARE DUE FOR COMPLETION IN 1986. EXPECTED TOTAL CAPACITY 2000+ 5-11 AGE RANGE. EXPANSION OF COLLINGWOOD ILLUSTRATES THE GROWTH OF TOWNS POPULATION. SUMMER 1982-78 PUPILS SUMMER 1983-160 PUPILS SUMMER 1984-280 PUPILS SUMMER 1985-451 PUPILS.
